sections.heading: Overview
content:
Dr. Evans is the Director of the Division of Environmental and Occupational
Health and the Director of the Center for the Study of Bioterrorism and
Emerging Infections for the School of Public Health at Saint Louis
University.

He has over 20 years of experience in environmental epidemiology with over
100 publications and presentations. He recently received close to a million
dollars from the Centers for Disease Control and Prevention to develop the
Bioterrorism Center. Specific objectives of the Center are:
